name: Caffeinated Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of an online coffee delivery platform designed to offer coffee of different blends to their customers. The company's platform offers a subscription based interface, as well as delivers the pack of coffee at a person's doorstep, enabling customers to taste dozens of coffees from different parts of the country.
one_liner: Developer of an online coffee delivery platform designed to offer coffee of different blends to their customers. The company's platform offers a subscription based interface, as well as delivers the pack of coffee at a person's doorstep, enabling customers to taste dozens of coffees from different parts of the country.
